S2S Card Payment.description: Server-to-server card payment flow with 3D Secure authentication. For new cards, the system initiates 3D Secure verification and returns an ACS template that must be rendered on the client side to complete authentication. The card details are securely processed and can be tokenized using the Save Card API after successful payment.
